file.name: negative4.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                foo:
                  value:
                    versions:
                      - status: CURRENT
                        updated: "2011-01-21T11:33:21Z"
                        id: v2.0
                        links:
                          - href: http://127.0.0.1:8774/v2/
                            rel: self
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        description: ID of the API the version
        required: true
        allowReserved: true
        schema:
          type: object
          properties:
            code:
              type: object
              required:
                - name
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                age:
                  type: integer

Error: make ir: path "/": get: parameters: field "code": nested objects not allowed
